desc: Custom and handmade high-quality Kydex holsters and sheaths for ESEE knives, KA-BAR knives, Smith and Wesson, Taurus, Sig Sauer. Custom gun holsters, holster rigs, mag pouches and more. Order your custom fixed-blade sheath or concealed carry holster today! Designed to be reliable, durable and comfortable. We know EDC.
